alert.note: Alert for Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:40AM EDT until April 01 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...The Shade River in Meigs County OH. * WHEN...Until 330 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...The Sugar Run Creek Bridge is flooded 200 feet downstream from the Oak Hill Road, and Shade River Bridge at a river stage of 17 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 935 AM EDT, the current stage of the Shade River at Chester is 16.2 feet and is expected to rise to to a minor flood stage of 17 feet. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen earlier in the morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chester. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
